mapper.insert: insert into product_category (id, name, parent_id, level, status, is_leaf, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update product_category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, parent_id, level, status, is_leaf, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified from product_category
